gold: The statistic presents a ranking of Brazilian soccer players participating in the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia , based on market value.
As of June 2018 , Neymar was the most valuable player , with a market value of 180 million euros.
Philippe Coutinho ranked second , with a value of 100 million euros .
